Pre-Game Insights: The Indian team, led by Suryakumar Yadav, is aiming to continue their winning streak against Sri Lanka in the T20I series.
Gautam Gambhir is the new head coach of the Indian team, looking to guide them to success.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series is a crucial preparation for India ahead of the T20 World Cup 2026.
Sri Lanka is aiming to bounce back from their poor T20 World Cup performance.
Others: The match will be held at the Pallekele International Cricket Stadium in Pallekele.
The series is a three-match T20I followed by three ODIs.
